snippet: An ambitious developer sees a future that includes high-fashion stores and high-end restaurants.
abstract: Craig Robins, developer who developed Miami Design District from moribund area of city and who founded DesignMiami event, is ramping up his efforts to transform neighborhood; Robin's company Dacra is partnering with L Real Estate to make district into hive of art, architecture, fine restaurants and high fashion.
lead_paragraph: An ambitious developer sees a future that includes high-fashion stores and high-end restaurants.
